Articles.Content:
So you might have seen the Ribbons around on the KSP forum. So I took the dicision to make it a public challenge.

Collect as many ribbons as posible in let's say a week (maybe we'll make this a montly challenge, don't know) so here are the rules

1) if you enter a planets/star/moons gravity-well you get the base Ribbon. No divices or anything. (you get the base ribbon of kerbin right of the bat)

2) when you complete the challange (like obtaining orbit) you can add that divice.

3) if you have no more place on the ribbon but have more divices please list them in your post

4) no cheating as this is not fair.

Have fun ribbon hunting!

( link for the ribbon site! http://ribbons.cgagnier.ca/index.php?success=2 )
